about_description: AMVStrm or Anime/Movie/Video Streaming is a website that allows you to watch anime online for free with no ads and annoying popup.
contact_description: If you have any questions, please contact us at
infrom_watch: Reccommended To Use Adblock To block ads from Iframe. We dont want to ruined your experience.

features.title: Features
features.li2:
Bookmarking Features that allows you to save anime to lists 
 and watch them later. (Beta)(Store In Cloud will be Comming Soon)

alert100bookmark: You have max out your bookmark list. Please delete some bookmark to add new one.
donation_desc: Even though its free, no ads and open-source website, donation is the most important for us so we can keep our servers up and running 24/7 with no interupption. 1$ can keep our server up and running for a week or a month.
translation_desc: Help us translate our website in Khmer language, So Our Cambodian visitor who does not know understands english well and help them a lot. We will add other language soon (es, ru, id, ph, ...).
